title: George Floyd, Central Park Karen, Jimmy Fallon, Ask Bitterman and more.
itunes:title: George Floyd, Central Park Karen, Jimmy Fallon, Ask Bitterman and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Fool #2 opens up the show and the crew talk about "Too Much Tuesday" and more. There was a grave injustice in Minneapolis. George Floyd died at the hands of police. The officers involved in George Floyd's death have been fired. Central Park Karen makes a fool of herself. Jimmy Fallon apologizes for blackface video that resurfaced. The Steve Harvey Nation gets to Ask Bitterman anything. Junior talks about NBA action returning just in time for summer. Today in Closing Remarks, the fellas give us their thoughts, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
